item.title: NPR Appoints CNN Alum Thomas Evans Editor in Chief
item.description: NPR appointed Thomas Evans, a nearly 22-year veteran of CNN who most recently served as its London bureau chief, as editor in chief. Evans takes over the role from Edith Chapin, NPR’s previous e
